Summary: Looks good - tastes good but doesn't brew
text:
I was excited to try the Brooklyn corner donut shop. When I got the package, it was like Christmas - I tore open the box and made my 1st cup. I really enjoyed the coffee. Great flavor... NOW... jump forward to today... I wasted 4 pods and was unable to produce a cup. The pod would fill with water, I could hear the machine trying to brew and nothing... actually water would trickle but it was full of grinds... I was unable to produce a cup of coffee this morning - what gives; I was under the impression the issues were corrected?!?!? Went back to my Coffee People Donut Shop and brewed without issue first try. Now when I get home from work, I will need to spend time cleaning the Keurig since the Brooklyn pods made a mess all over my machine.

On a side note, the cups that I was able to brew were very good..

I am updating this as they send me a new box; no issues. I am perfectly content with the coffee..
